name: Ritual Casting March 2022 Release - Tuya
description:
Ritual Casting March 2022 Patreon Release featuring Tuya, Queen of the Plains for 3D Printing.

Become a Patron to gain access to this month's content.

One can never be sure if the rumbling rolling over the plains is that of thunder or the hooves of the Plainsfolk drumming the beat of war.

  • 1:10 scale statue diorama of Tuya, Queen of the Plains with:   
    • 2 head options - Bald and with hair   
    • 2 bow options - Without string so proper thread or fishing wire can be used. With  string - Intended to be printed on a larger scale (1:8 or larger) 
    • Combined, Multi-part and Pre-supported STLs
  • 1:10 scale artistic nude model of Tuya, Queen of the Plains with:   
    • Combined, Multi-part and Pre-supported STLs   
    • 2 bow options - Without string so proper thread or fishing wire can be used. With string - Intended to be printed on a larger scale (1:8 or larger)
  • 1 to 1 scale bow
  • Practice Texture Swatch - Practice painting the 4 most prominent textures of the model.

NOTE: Due to how thin some parts are I'm not officially supporting a 14th scale version of this model - I don't have the capacity to be able to guarantee it would be printable at 14th scale.  However, if you wish to try it yourself then you will need to scale it down to 70% (reduce it by 30% or 28.5714286% if you're super picky).
